attributes.action: Prevent the ticket touts from buying up bulk tickets and then selling them on e bay for a ridiculously high price preventing real music fans from being able to attend festivals through the summer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tickets for Carling Reading Festival went on sale at 1900 on 19 March, by 1903 many websites were showing the festival as being sold out, by 1915 touts were selling tickets for double the face value on e bay. This is an unacceptable practice and festival organisers and the government need to take responsibility for music fans constantly being penalised by these sharks.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
